title: Recording using external mic
content:
I'm going to record videos using an external mic with my pixel 2. 
I can see that it for quite some time has been very difficult. 

I get the option to choose the external microphone, so I guess there should be some kind of connectivity between phone/app and external microphone. But when watching the video afterwards there's no sound at all. I have tried to unplug the external mic before watching, I have tried to restart app and watch, I have tried to send video to my pc and watch - no sound at all. 

Is it some kind of gear that I need that I don't have (adapter of some kind, specific microphone), even though I get the option to choose the external mic? Or do I need to use a third party app to get it to work? Or is it some kind of setting I have missed besides simply choosing to use the external mic? Or does it simply not work (STILL)??

Thanks for any answers.
